radiographic_examinations.findings: Disproportionate mesomelic shortening of the arms with bowing of the radius, shortening of the phalanges and metacarpal bones, and mild platyspondyly and mild interpediculate narrowing of the vertebral column.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Six months after the operation, recurrence of pseudoaneurysm on the right common iliac artery.
